reviews.review: In order to become anything else other than useless, be ready to play over a minimum of 3000 hours. Often you will feel that your holding a gun without a trigger. Randomly shooting hoping that you can hear the footsteps of your enemies over the sound of enraged and furious Russians on your team screaming for you not be a shithead or Мудак. Although eventually you will learn that its not skills that earn respect its skins. Spending $4000 on a group of pixels, will surely make people bow to your will and reassure them that you in fact have no weaknesses. Do not be confused though that does not mean you are safe. Everyone eventually in this game develops "weaknesses" mentally by just simply communicating with members in the community. Despite all this, I have not been able to stop playing and currently have 345 hours. CSGO the best game on steam!
não tenho palavras pra descrever o quanto eu gosto desse jogo...
It used to be amazing. Now were all just waiting for CSGO 2 with a better anti cheat system.
gra godna polecania, chociaż jest w niej bardzo dużo oszustów
Хорошая игра если убрать из неё читеров, делать конечно же этого валв не собиаеться!

This game is totally trash. After 2126 hours i uninstalled it. Third time i get banned because some stupid issues with ”cannot play on secure servers for one of the following reasons...” message. Don t waste your time. 
RIP Valve.

Gra jest ogólnie dobra, niestety mimo dobrej oprawy graficznej i rozbudowanego trybu multiplayer z różnymi rodzajami meczy, jest dużo społeczności, która za wszelką cenę chce popsuć frajdę z gry i utrudnić wygraną (to znaczy cheaterzy czy toxicki). Mimo tego i tak polecam tę grę jeśli chce się rywalizować czy grać ze znajomymi albo poćwiczyć tempo reakcji ;)
